verses.verse: For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> we must <S%G1163><s%> pay <S%G4337><s%> much <S%G4057><s%> closer <S%G4057><s%> attention <S%G4337><s%> to what we have heard, <S%G191><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> we drift <S%G3901><s%> away <S%G3901><s%> [from it.]

For if <S%G1487><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> proved <S%G1096><s%> unalterable, <S%G949><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> transgression <S%G3847><s%> and disobedience <S%G3876><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a just <S%G1738><s%> recompense, <S%G3405><s%>

how <S%G4459><s%> shall we escape <S%G1628><s%> if we neglect <S%G272><s%> so <S%G5082><s%> great <S%G5082><s%> a salvation <S%G4991><s%>? After <S%G3748><s%> it was at the first <S%G746><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> it was confirmed <S%G950><s%> to us by those <S%G3588><s%> who heard, <S%G191><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> also bearing <S%G4901><s%> witness <S%G4901><s%> with them, both <S%G5037><s%> by signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders <S%G5059><s%> and by various <S%G4164><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> and by gifts <S%G3311><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to His own will. <S%G2308><s%>
For He did not subject <S%G5293><s%> to angels <S%G32><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> to come, <S%G3195><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we are speaking. <S%G2980><s%>

But one <S%G5100><s%> has testified <S%G1263><s%> somewhere, <S%G4225><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is man, <S%G444><s%> that Thou rememberest <S%G3403><s%> him? Or <S%G2228><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> that Thou art concerned <S%G1980><s%> about <S%G1980><s%> him?

"Thou hast made <S%G1642><s%> him for a little <S%G1024><s%> while <S%G1024><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels; <S%G32><s%> Thou hast crowned <S%G4737><s%> him with glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor, <S%G5092><s%> And hast appointed <S%G2525><s%> him over <S%G1909><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of Thy hands; <S%G5495><s%>

Thou hast put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> in subjection <S%G5293><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> his feet. <S%G4228><s%>" For in subjecting <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> to him, He left <S%G863><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> that is not subject <S%G506><s%> to him. But now <S%G3568><s%> we do not yet <S%G3768><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> subjected <S%G5293><s%> to him.

But we do see <S%G991><s%> Him who has been made <S%G1642><s%> for a little <S%G1024><s%> while <S%G1024><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels, <S%G32><s%> [namely,] Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the suffering <S%G3804><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> crowned <S%G4737><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor, <S%G5092><s%> that by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> He might taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for everyone. <S%G3956><s%>

For it was fitting <S%G4241><s%> for Him, for whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> in bringing <S%G71><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> to glory, <S%G1391><s%> to perfect <S%G5048><s%> the author <S%G747><s%> of their salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> sufferings. <S%G3804><s%>

For both <S%G5037><s%> He who sanctifies <S%G37><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who are sanctified <S%G37><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> from one <S%G1520><s%> [Father]; for which <S%G3739><s%> reason <S%G156><s%> He is not ashamed <S%G1870><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> them brethren, <S%G80><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I will proclaim <S%G518><s%> Thy name <S%G3686><s%> to My brethren, <S%G80><s%> In the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the congregation <S%G1577><s%> I will sing <S%G5214><s%> Thy praise. <S%G5214><s%>"

And again, <S%G3825><s%> "I will put <S%G3982><s%> My trust <S%G3982><s%> in Him." And again, <S%G3825><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I and the children <S%G3813><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> Me."

Since <S%G1893><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%> share <S%G2841><s%> in flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G3898><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> partook <S%G3348><s%> of the same, <S%G846><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> He might render <S%G2673><s%> powerless <S%G2673><s%> him who had <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G2904><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> that is, the devil; <S%G1228><s%>

and might deliver <S%G525><s%> those who <S%G3745><s%> through fear <S%G5401><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> were subject <S%G1777><s%> to slavery <S%G1397><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their lives. <S%G2198><s%>

For assuredly <S%G1222><s%> He does not give <S%G1949><s%> help <S%G1949><s%> to angels, <S%G32><s%> but He gives <S%G1949><s%> help <S%G1949><s%> to the descendant <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3606><s%> He had <S%G3784><s%> to be made <S%G3666><s%> like <S%G3666><s%> His brethren <S%G80><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> that He might become <S%G1096><s%> a merciful <S%G1655><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> in things pertaining <S%G4314><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> to make <S%G2433><s%> propitiation <S%G2433><s%> for the sins <S%G266><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>

For since He Himself <S%G846><s%> was tempted <S%G3985><s%> in that which <S%G3739><s%> He has suffered, <S%G3958><s%> He is able <S%G1410><s%> to come <S%G997><s%> to the aid <S%G997><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who are tempted. <S%G3985><s%>
